summary: Historian Klaus Müller interviews survivors of the Nazi persecution of homosexuals because of the German Penal Code of 1871, Paragraph 175.
cast: Rupert Everett|Klaus Müller|Karl Gorath|Pierre Seel|Heinz F.|Annette Eick|Albrecht Becker|Gad Beck|Heinz Dörmer|Marlene Dietrich|Magnus Hirschfeld|Adolf Hitler|Ernst Röhm
keywords: male frontal nudity|persecution of homosexuals in nazi germany|persecution of homosexuals|discrimination|europe
title: Paragraph 175
